EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1 - EMEA/US - 2015.02.17.Email - Follow
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You at our Webinar - What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry that we missed you at our ‘What’s New’ webinar! Tricentis’ own VP of Product Management, Gerd Weishaar, and our Worldwide Director for Presales, Roman Zednik, gave a walk-through and demo of all the new features of Release 8.3 service pack 1. Questions from the audience helped to keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-emea-watch.html>. Additional videos of our new features and solutions are also available here <http://www.tricentis.com/products/what-is-new>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Director Presales Worldwide Tricentis
